attributes.action: Veto any proposal to accord a state funeral to Lady Margaret Thatcher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mrs Thatcher is viewed by many as a divisive influence on British life, she no more deserves the honour of a state funeral than many other eminent and talented Britons. There is also a precedent set by honouring her in this way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
